captions.text: Well, we do exist, but we don't.
Actors, man! We're just being played by actors.

Tom, you know I don't have time for this.
I have to meet Amy in...

Amy the beautiful. Amy the unattainable. Amy
the most attractive girl in town.

Look at her, man! She's a six at best. How
could she be the most attractive girl in town.

Tom, you know how long it's taken me to convince
Amy to go out on a date with me.
Why are you choosing now to be unsupportive?
Because this is more important than you and her.
This is more important than me and you.
This is about reality as we know it.
How is this about reality as we know it?

Because if you go on that date with Amy, then
life as we know will come to an end.
Okay, just think about it for a second.
What if we are characters in a film?

Well, if you finish your story arc then the
film is going to end.

Yeah, y'know. Boy meet girl, stuff happens,
boy and girl hook up, roll credits.
And the film that we are in is...
And if we get together, then the film ends.
Okay, erm... How old are you?
And you don't find that strange?

Oh, I don't know the fact that neither of
us look over 18.
Oh great, so now we are in a bad film too?

Hey, it could be a student film. That would
explain why your girlfriend is so ugly.

Amy is not ugly and so far your entire argument
against reality is that we are baby faced.
You're not very good at this.
Where do you think you live?
Is it your apartment? Or, is it student accommodation?

My god... Never thought about it before...
Two toasters?
We're all doomed! Somebody call the pentagon!
Okay fine, i'll give you some more proof then!

Films have continuity errors and we are going
to sit here and wait till one of those happens.
Are you serious? Are you being serious right now?
That mug was not there before.
Well, this was a fun game. I have to go now.
Let me make one thing clear to you.
If and when you meet Amy you can't act like this.

If? Chris, there won't be an if because if
you go on this date with Amy then t-
Time itself will end. Yes. I know. And that's exactly the kind of thing you have to not say.
Chris could you take this seriously!

Well, no. We don't have time for you to be
playing the straight man. What if i'm right?

Well, if you're right then the end of my dry
spell will also mark the end of time.
Well, do you see and other option?

This is what this is about isn't it. You just
don't want me to get a girlfriend.
Of course! Why didn't I see it coming?!
You're just trying to put me off Amy.

Let me guess, you're afraid that if we start
dating then we won't spend as much time together?

Like she'll take over my life and you'll be
brushed to the side?
How could you accuse me of being so petty! I've already told you this is bigger than me and you.

Okay, well I promise that we are going to
spend the same amount of time together.
She's not going to come between us. Okay?
Is there anything I can do to stop you?

No, not really... And if you care so much
why don't you rewrite the script?
Oh yeah because I wrote this! I have no say in it!
So why do you care so much?
Because I don't know what happens when it ends...

Well, maybe that's just the big grand cycle
of life. Maybe you're not supposed to know.
Maybe we are not in a film.

How do you know?! I mean what do you remember
from today?

Errrrr, I listened to some music. I read a
book. Then you came over all crazy.

Hey, good news. If you and Amy hook up maybe
time will come to and end. I don't even think
that's like the main storyline here.

Oh great, so now i'm not a main character
in my own life?!

Well, no. That's not what i'm saying. I just
think you're sex life is not the primary concern here.

Well, maybe this film is about you losing
a stupid argument.
Oh, I'm late i've got to go!

I guess that would make this my story arc
wouldn't it?!

I student film about a loss of a close one!
Real original! Who thought of that?!
No! No, no, no! This can't! No!

comments.author: Dale korhammer

comments.text:
Maybe all the youtube comments you read aren't from real people. Maybe 
nobody you know is real. Maybe they are all robots. And after the robot 
uprising, no humans were left. Except you. And now, in the next generation 
of robots which evolved to developed a compassion system, want to bring 
back the species they have annihilated. So they are using you as a test 
subject to understand how the human mind works by re-creating the world as 
they knew it before the uprising in order to gather enough information 
about human societal behavior from you in order to raise a new society of 
humans. 


Also this was once of the greatest and funniest films I've seen made by Tom 
in his earlier years. Great job and I hope to see more great, long short 
stories like this.﻿

comments.author: martijn van weele

comments.text:
+Can't Think of a name Descartes. I think, therefor, I am. By that he meant 
that because all of our senses can be fooled, we cannot be sure of 
anything, and might as well be deceived in every possible way. This leaves 
us with one certainty: there is something that is deceived, me. The fact 
that I can be deceived (my thoughts can be manipulated), proves my 
existance, for it is impossible to deceive something that is not there.
comments.author: martijn van weele
